markdownRemark.excerpt: Alḥamdulillāh the Masjid is open and sisters are welcome for the five daily prayers, classes and anytime during the week except jumuʿah at this time, due to…
markdownRemark.html: Alḥamdulillāh the Masjid is open and sisters are welcome for the five daily prayers, classes and anytime during the week except jumuʿah at this time, due to needing their section to accommodate social distancing.
